value:
$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, my. Here they come. So punctual!$k$p$EFace_Smile|It's your turn, dear. Use that blade of
yours to send our enemies to the
heavens, as our contract demands.$k$pIs that understood, Princess Ayra?$k$p$WmMPID_アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yes, yes. But know that if you fail to
uphold your end of the bargain, you'll
have to answer to me.$k$pAnd I'd follow you to the depths of
hell just to lay hands on that neck
of yours, if it came to that.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ooh, scary! But don't worry. Fight as
fiercely as I know you can, and I'll be
happy to send you back home.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Now show me what you're really
made of. There's a dear.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ロキアンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, what a shame. I guess I won't be
freeing you just yet, Princess.$k$p$EFace_Smile|As the contract stipulates, it's time for
you to retreat. Got it?$k$p$WmMPID_アイラ,ch06_06_Ira_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Tch...$k$p$Sbs150|
